titles.title: Concurrent resolution recognizing the sacrifices being made by the families of members of the Armed Forces and supporting the designation of a week as National Military Families Week.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
6/9/2005--Introduced. Recognizes the sacrifices of military families and the support they provide for their loved ones serving as members of the Armed Forces.
Supports the designation of a week as National Military Families Week.
